mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mid, name, password, role, phone, address, sum, invitation_code, real_name, bank_password, bank_name, bank_number) VALUES(#{mid}, #{name}, #{password}, #{role}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{sum}, #{invitation_code}, #{real_name}, #{bank_password}, #{bank_name}, #{bank_number})

INSERT INTO single_note(snid, mid, bet_time, number, type, league, team_h, team_c, bet, score, bet_type, occasion, ior_type, ior_ratio, ratio, strong, state, money, valid_money, deal_money, win_lose) VALUES(#{snid}, #{mid}, now(), #{number}, #{type}, #{league}, #{team_h}, #{team_c}, #{bet}, #{score}, #{bet_type}, #{occasion}, #{ior_type}, #{ior_ratio}, #{ratio}, #{strong}, #{state}, #{money}, #{valid_money}, #{deal_money}, #{win_lose})
